Public Member Functions

 InputActionList ()
void RegisterInputAction (InputAction *action)
 Allows registration of an InputAction object to the list.

Detailed Description

InputActionList is a container class which contains a list of pointers to InputActions. InputActions are registered via RegisterInputAction to the list. Several instances of InputActionList can exist. The InputActions themselves must be instanced seperately and can be registered to more then one InputActionList.
